About Abhay

BIO

I am 21 years old engineering student completing my bachelors in Computer Science and Engineering. I Currently i am an android developer using java, firebase and xml as my tools and a competitive programmer coding in languages java and python.

"ilm mujhe mere hunar ka waqt ne karaya,
karke masruuf hunar-e-harf-o-nava mein,
mere andar ke shaa.ir se mujhe ruu-ba-ruu karaya.."

I love writing poems and shayaris which act as a stress buster for me. My other hobbies are travelling and playing video games.
